resources.string: These methods have been tested several times and have proven to work without any side effects. However, please understand that it is not possible to say that in anticipation for every kind and type of device. Please be careful with this application.
WARNING: This app only works for rooted devices!
Please note: ROOT ACCESS is required.

WARNING: THIS METHOD WILL DELETE ALL WIFI PASSWORDS!

How to read the WiFi passwords: 
1. Install a file manager with root access (e.g. Root Browser) 
2. Go to /data/misc/wifi and open the file wpa_supplicant.conf 
3. Write down the passwords on a piece of paper (Do NOT backup the file!!!) 

Please note: ROOT ACCESS is required.
Success! Your WiFi has been turned on again (reconnecting may take a while). If it still does not work properly, please try another method.

It seems your phone is not rooted. Did you grant superuser rights? Please note that this application only works with ROOT PERMISSION. If your phone is rooted yet this dialog still pops up, please report this issue by pressing the Report button.
There was an unexpected error! Please help me fix that by sending me the crash log. No personal information is collected and you can see the info before it\'s sent!
